sentence.Network_en: The rain fell in torrents , insomuch that we were wet through.
sentence.Network_cn: 大雨滂沱, 我们全身都湿透了.

sentence.Network_en: The rain fell in torrents insomuch that we were drenched.
sentence.Network_cn: 倾盆大雨使我们变成落汤鸡.

sentence.Network_en: He worked very fast, insomuch that he was through in an hour.
sentence.Network_cn: 他工作得很快, 一小时内便做完了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: insofar,在...的范围insomuch,由于,就此程度而言的感言：

list.abs: for there shall arise false Christs , and false prophets , and shall shew great signs and wonders insomuch that , if it were possible , they shall deceive the very elect .因为假基督、假先知、将要起来、显大神迹、大奇事．倘若能行、连选民也就迷惑了。
insomuch that they were all amazed , and glorified God , saying , We never saw it on this fashion .以致众人都惊奇，归荣耀与神说，我们从来没有见过这样的事。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: originally as in so much, translating French en tant (que) 'in so much (as')

means.word_mean: 1. to such an extent or degree; so
